eu.infomas.dropbox

Class Request

  • java.lang.Object
    • eu.infomas.dropbox.Request

  • public final class Request
extends Object
    Request holds all data for a HTTP(S) REST Request. A Builder is used for creating new Request instances.
    Since:
    infomas-asl 3.0.2
    Author:
    Ronald K. Muller
    See Also:
    RestClient

    • Method Detail

      • withMethod

        public static Request.Builder withMethod(String method)
        Factory method, starts the building of a HTTP REST Request. Specify the HTTP method (i.e "GET", "POST" or "PUT") of the request.
